name: Project 4 3D FPS Complete Submission
description:
This is my Project 4 3D FPS Complete Project

3 major modifications

Level 1 - Get to the portal that is behind a couple of door that needs to be open with the key with a few enemies blocking the entrance.

Level 2 - Fight the boss with the automatic firing electro gun only and the boss is renamed and health increased and firing rate and spawners are modifed.

Level 3 - Going inside the space base with only a shotgun and its a maze and you have to find the right key to beat the level and there will be a lot of rooms with tons of enemies. The enemies have spawners when destroyed drops the key for a door.

Change the name for the main menu and the environment is enhanced in terms of size.

Each level uses one gun per level for example level 1 is the pistol level 2 is the electro gun and level 3 has the shotgun.

Credits:

Created By Vinh Tran
